page.title: 19Metal Box PLC Carlisle (iii)
page.content: The final stages in manufacturing are the stamping of the bottoms to the bodies and the hinging of the lids to the bodies of the tins. Quality cont- rol should ensure that the customer is satisfied, but it has been known for the pattern on 25,000 tins to be rubb- ed off and reprinted! A recent set of three octagonal tins nested one inside another and was dec- orated with paintings of steam locos and railway company crests,on a maroon ground. LMS Pacific "City of Birming- ham" (now in Birmingham Museum of Sc- ience & Industry) is on the outer lid. {James Street}is responsible for the packaging of high street brands such as{Yardleys Cussons}and{Lentheric}talc {Quality Street}sweets,{Capstan Players and{Gold Block}tobacco, and{Duckhams} and{Castrol GTX}oil. The{GTX}("liquid engineering") tin features in TV ads!
